alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 5:28PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Crawford and northern Sebastian Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 528 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Barling, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Alma... Barling... Lavaca... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Kibler... Central City... Concord... Shibley... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 8 and 13. Interstate 540 between mile markers 2 and 3, and between mile markers 6 and 10. Interstate 49 near mile marker 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
